pullrequest.title: Install server fixture for use outside of gazebo.

content.raw: It seems really unwieldy to copy all of gtest into the standalone example. Can we figure out a way to link to the gtest built by the existing test fixture? Or could we even point to the existing gtest sources in `test/gtest`, since `examples` will be built from sources anyway?
content.html: It seems really unwieldy to copy all of gtest into the standalone example. Can we figure out a way to link to the gtest built by the existing test fixture? Or could we even point to the existing gtest sources in test/gtest, since examples will be built from sources anyway?
